content: @Heather Macbeth, could you give us an update on feat(geometry/manifold/sheaf): structure sheaf of a manifold #19094, which is preventing progress on feat: port Geometry.Manifold.ContMDiff !4#4656 ?
If I understand correctly, #19094 doesn't refactor ContMDiff, just adds a few lemmas.
So, I think that we should proceed with !4#4656 (mostly stalled on failing simp only [mfld_simps])
